Description:
1ha (app 2.5acre) Homesite with country views and open outlook
A wonderful lifestyle 2.5acre (app.) allotment only minutes to Primary school and walking distance to town centre. Fully fenced, with water connected and power available, this homesite offers a great open outlook with views of Mt Beckworth and surrounding areas. Set amongst similar size properties, and just over 1.5km to the post office, it is hard to find this sort of land parcel at such an affordable price. Don't delay your purchase. Inspect today or you may miss out!
Insights: 8 Island Street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Plenty of Potential on 2521 m2
If you are looking for a project then this could be the one for you. Bring this period style shell back to life right in the heart of Clunes. Set on over 1/2 acre, also includes extra cabin shell, perfect setting for a B&B with space for extra cottages with subdivision potential (STCA). Elevated position over looking the township and country surrounds. Limited only by your imagination! Short stroll to historic Fraser Street with selection of shops & cafés. Power, water& sewerage connected to block.
For more information please contact:
Jo Millar 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers 0437 456 908

Description:
What A Home! What A Renovation!
This home can only be best described as a labour of love, meticulously renovated around its many classical Victorian features, this home is situated on 1028M2 allotment in prestigious central location of Clunes. Accommodating, two separate living zones (formal lounge and formal dining) each with french doors opening to the homes surround bull nose veranda, and three spacious bedrooms (master with open fire place). An impressive Victorian themed bathroom features separate shower and claw foot bath, while the spacious fully appointed open plan kitchen meals area would please any entertainer and the well-designed laundry offers ample bench and storage space. Year round comfort is assured with reverse cycle heating and cooling to all bedrooms and living areas with the added option of slow combustion heating for the winter months. Outdoor features include massive covered outdoor entertaining area amid landscaped gardens fully enclosed backyard storage and garden shed. All in all an exceptionally rare and sensational opportunity in this vibrant and trendy township that even the most fastidious buyers will be proud to call home.
Insights: 39 Service Street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Contemporary Country Living Without Compromise
Enjoy the rural lifestyle without the work in this stylish two bedroom home on the edge of Clunes.
Set high on a hill & overlooking farmland, this stunning home offers a designer kitchen & contemporary living/dining area, each with direct courtyard access.
Each bedroom, both with BIRs, is serviced by a central bathroom with bath & shower.
Warmed by a wood heater, and cooled by a reverse cycle air-conditioner.
This delightful home features double-glazed windows, European laundry, rainwater tanks, large deck areas, low maintenance garden and a reflection pond for those quiet moments.
An ideal permanent residence, or an enviable & stylish weekender.
IN CONJUNCTION WITH AAG PROPERTY CONSULTANTS CLUNES
ANGELA FLOWERS
0437 456 908 OR JO MILLAR 0438 081 301
Mark Smith : 0439 321 566

Description:
Renovated 3 Bedroom Home on large block
Located in the township of Clunes is this very comfortable 3 bedroom plus study home set on a large fully fenced 1366m2 block making it ideal for a young family or perhaps just the space to grow your own fruit & veg.
Features include:
Open plan kitchen/dining/living , lpg cooking and instantaneous hws,
dishwasher, split system for heating & cooling. The large study or parents retreat features French doors opening onto the undercover entertaining area. A large 7mx10m garage, easy care garden & good fencing with enclosed yard all together makes a lovely home, weekender or terrific investment. Currently tenanted at $280 p/w.

Description:
27.82 Ha 68.74 Acres Few And Far Between Views, Water & Privacy
Well situated in an area that offers excellent access to Miners Rest and the township of Clunes this allotment is assured to please everyone. The entire property enjoys unfettered access to permanent water supplied Beckworth Creek which delivers approximately of 330 metres of private frontage either side. An abundance of vantage points offer views of adjoining valleys and Mount Beckworth Conservation Reserve which abuts the Western fence line. A balance of cleared pastures and native forest will please both the hobby farmer and nature lover. A rare and stunning offering ideal for your dream home (STCA) in an extremely sought area.
Insights: 80 Mountain Creek Road, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
Tree Change Is Now Very Reachable
If you are looking for a bargain, you need to call right NOW! A gorgeous 590m2 allotment is up for grabs in the quaint township of Clunes. A stone carriageway will direct you to this amazing private allotment. With services ready to be connected and permits and plans available for a three bedroom home, this really is a wish come true. All that is necessary is to pick up the phone.
Set in the picturesque township of Clunes where quaint stores, vineyards and wineries are abundant, this allotment provides complete convenience to the primary school and just minutes from the town and further amenities. Just a short drive to Ballarat and just an hour and 20 minutes drive east to Melbourne, this amazing deal will excite. Your plans for a tree change are now very reachable. To obtain further details and exact measurements call our agents today.
Insights: 16A Canterbury Street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
2 Story Country Cottage
Soak up the gorgeous winter sun on the front deck of this north facing 3 Bedroom beauty. Imagine being fireside with a good book or looking out to a landscaped garden featuring your very own seasonal creek complete with footbridge. This lovely home has a surprisingly large amount of storage as a feature of design. Set on 1067m2, this property also includes the lease option of the adjoining block for that extra sense of space.
Includes:
3 Bedrooms, master with WIR and two way bathroom
2 Living with ceiling fans
Open plan kitchen/dining
Wood heating & split system
Easy care established garden with plenty of room for more
Garden shedding, single carport
Sun blinds on west side
Inspection by appointment.

Description:
Large 2 storey country home set on 1629m2
This 2 story family home certainly has that WOW factor you've been looking for. The high exposed ceiling timber is a great feature along with the story book style windows that flood the living rooms with natural light. Situated to take advantage of the glorious sunshine with its north eastern aspect. Watch the sun rise from your HUGE master bedroom with walk in robe and full en-suite from your private balcony. Relax and enjoy a good book or glass of wine on one of 3 decks with double doors from living room.
Features are many and include:
3 large bedrooms with built in robes
Separate studio or home office with split system for climate control
Lounge and separate living plus study area
Leadlight windows feature in family room
Wood heating along with split system for year round comfort.
Outdoor entertaining area with pizza oven
Remote control double garage
Single garage with large wood/potting shed
Vegie garden with a variety of fruit trees
Drought tolerant garden
Enclosed demountable cat run
Walking distance to shopping precinct
For more information on this unique property please contact Jo Millar 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers on 0437 456 908

Description:
Cute As Can Be With 1/2 An Acre For A Pony
Looking for a weekender, or are ready for some restoration work? This pretty little cottage in the historic township of Clunes, provides all the peace and tranquillity of a home away from home. Consisting of three bedrooms, this original miner's cottage could be the start of something truly amazing. The novel lean to' provides a quaint kitchen with dado boards and detailed fire mantel, whilst the dining area extends across the further side of the room. Laminate cabinetry has been installed for grocery storage, which has been topped with sunny yellow laminex which provides a real lift to this area. The lounge provides a cosy combustion fire with brick surround and has been carpeted for extra warmth and comfort. The bathroom is ready for a facelift, yet provides every element for daily hygiene. Splashed with vibrant colours here and there internally, this cutey' holds loads of potential for those with some imaginative flair.
Outside, there is a garage, ample shedding and an undercover area that can be used for entertaining, whilst the front faade is designed with a full width bullnose veranda and presented with a gorgeous entry rose arbour. Set on approx. 1/2 acre and surrounded by new builds, this home has huge potential for further buildings or extensions, with subdivision probability (STCA). Call our agents today for further information and inspection times.
Insights: 16 Angus Street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2019 and 17 other 3 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
INVITING LIFESTYLE - INVITING SETTING - SPACIOUS HOME - 16 ACRES
Located at Evansford, some 15 minutes to Clunes, is this appealing property with a 30 sq (approx) double brick family home with 16 acres, great shedding, studio/bungalow, quiet location & an inviting tranquil setting. This property offers so much for all of the family with 4 or 5 bedrooms or 4 & a study, great kitchen with butler's pantry, formal dining, formal lounge, family meals area, 2 outdoor entertaining areas, master bedroom with ensuite with spa bath, cathedral ceilings & presentation plus throughout. Outside there is a studio/bungalow (currently used as a craftroom), established gardens, massive amounts of shedding, chook run, 3 dams & 16 acres for horses or livestock. Add only 15 minutes to Clunes, 20 minutes to Maryborough & 30 minutes to Ballarat & this is a must see country property. Phone now!
Insights: 59 Simpsons Lane, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2016 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
Well presented 3 bedroom country home on 4 acres
Set well back for privacy is this lovely low maintenance home, great for outdoor entertaining with large under cover decking to rear overlooking a beautiful rose garden. Save on water bills with the whole house set up to run off rain water tank or town water.
Features include:
New timber look flooring to living areas
3 Bedrooms, en-suite to main, ceiling fans, built-in robes
New Chef stove with ceramic cooktop, walk in pantry
Split system/wood fire heating
Easy care gardens including mature shade trees, rose garden, fruit trees & vegetable patch all with watering system fed from dam pump
Double garage with carport plus 2 extra undercover parking spaces
3x6 workshop, wood shed & garden shed
Cat run & Chicken coup
Excellent fencing, enclosed house garden, easy access to rear paddock
On school bus route
Only minutes to main shopping precinct of Clunes

Description:
VALLEY VIEWS - NEAT AS A PIN - 6 ACRES
Located at Mt Glasgow, 10 minutes north of Clunes, 30 minutes to Ballarat & 15 minutes to Maryborough, this well presented 2 or 3 bedroom updated home with 6 acres & great valley views is a must to inspect. With a tranquil setting, this home has plenty to offer with 2 large bedrooms, smaller third bedroom/bungalow/studio, updated kitchen with new electric stove, new bathroom & formal lounge with country views & polished hardwood floors. Outside, this property offers tank & bore water, dam, 2 stables, day yard, dog & chook runs, elovatored located to enjoy the views & an inviting driveway entrance - this affordable country package is complete. Phone now for more details.

Description:
Unique 2 Story Country Cottage on approx 3.5 acres
Welcome to the country with this solid Bluestone and timber 3 Bedroom beauty.
A truly romantic residence recently renovated inside and out with quality fittings & fixtures. From the welcoming country kitchen to the reappointment of the gorgeous upstairs bathroom, you'll fall in love with the early settler ambiance that has been created by the current owners. Features include: Mosaic entry, wood heating and split system separate dressing room, dbl shower, upstairs & downstairs w/c, ceiling fans to all bedrooms and balcony off main with lovely views of Mount Beckworth. Entertaining area at rear with veranda on 3 sides. Easy care garden including fruit trees, and raised vegetable garden with plenty of room for more. Some shedding for workshop or storage.
Inspection by appointment.

Description:
Recently Constructed Home On 3.9 Acres
Sitting on 3.9 acres, this recently constructed home with Colorbond roof is modern and stylishly decorated. The generous hallway gives a warm inviting feel which perfectly complements the neutral dcor. The large open plan living area is light and airy with views to the bushland beyond. This home is built to strict new BAL40 standards, and has an energy rating exceeding 6 stars. The balance of the 6 year builder's warranty applies. With a gas powered 900mm free standing stove and tiled splashbacks, this Laminex kitchen provides ample cabinetry, a walk in pantry along with a clean efficient work space.
All 3 bedrooms are generous in size, one of which features a large walk in robe. The beautifully tiled family bathroom is spacious with a shower, vanity and toilet along with a second toilet positioned in the laundry. This home is well protected with security alarms and doors. Other features include a ducted dual-zone heating and air-conditioning system, and town water, power and telephone line. Externally, there is a generous 60 square metre shed.
Be charmed by the calm of the township and the position of this home. You will be excited by the influx of visitors at the Annual Booktown Festival. For further particulars regarding this fabulous slice of real estate, call our agent today. Access is from McDonald's Road (approximately opposite 295 McDonalds Road).

Description:
Fabulous Family Entertainer
Room is not an issue at this delightful property in Clunes. Whether it is cars, family or land space, this fabulous 1673m2 allotment offers it all. A large corner block with a secure spacious yard offers a cubby house, expanses of sweeping lawns and an undercover pergola for outdoor entertaining. A massive 40 x 20 shed with concrete floor, power, wood heating and toilet provide the ideal man cave or a fabulous place to cover those most important vehicles. This structure also provides the opportunity for storage or a home business to operate with ease (STCA). Further features outside include three tanks providing 9500L of fresh water, two wood sheds along with 10 solar panels providing 2.5kW of solar energy.
Inside boasts a spread of delightful surprises, including a stylish hallway and arched entry, four good size bedrooms with BIR & beautiful ceiling fans, along with a master suite which boasts a split system, large walk in robe, a huge ensuite with a relaxing oval spa bath, shower, vanity and toilet for added luxury. The galley style kitchen is a culinary treat, with stainless steel appliances including a built in espresso bar, two pantries, along with wide benches and ample drawer space. The family bathroom boasts a shower, a second bath, & a large vanity; along with a new hot water service which creates an extra boost to the water temperature. An independent laundry also covers all the hygiene needs.
Evaporative cooling and wood heating add to the various benefits when heating and cooling the home, while the many windows offer a cross ventilation breeze. Both the family area and the lounge are open in design with built in shelves creating a fabulous place to store all those odds and ends, while the overall palette is toned in greys with white accents. This huge modern home of approx 10+ years, would be ideal for growing families, especially those looking at living a relaxed country life in the picturesque township of Clunes. Overflowing with history, natural surrounds and magnificent scenic walks, this delightful country town is just 10 minutes from the buzzing township of Creswick with a further 20 minutes onto the city of Ballarat. Call today for further details.

Description:
Location, Location with 5 Star Energy Rating on 817m2
For more than meets the eye, this contemporary open plan home is architecturally designed, approximately 2yrs old and only one block from the historic main street of Clunes. With versatility in mind, the study/library or second living area can also be used as the 2nd bedroom when unexpected guests arrive. Floating bamboo flooring features throughout the home and French doors provide wonderful light and cross ventilation. Fully insulated, the reverse cycle heating/cooling plus a carbon neutral ethanol fire place takes care of climate control. Careful design has ample storage both inside and out. The huge two way bathroom includes a foot spa and full length window for a relaxed tiered garden view along with the recently established orchard set to produce a wide variety of fruits to enjoy.
Attention to detail with this property is a must see for the serious buyer.
For more information regarding this property please contact Jo Millar on 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers on 0437 456 908
